headline.print_headline: Top Doctors' Prescription for Feverish Planet: Cut Out Coal
headline.main: Top Doctors' Prescription for Feverish Planet: Cut Out Coal

docs.lead_paragraph: Some top international doctors and public health experts have issued an urgent prescription for a feverish planet Earth: Get off coal as soon as possible.
docs.snippet: Some top international doctors and public health experts have issued an urgent prescription for a feverish planet Earth: Get off coal as soon as possible.
